duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute a full roster of programs each year.
Manage all programs and their stakeholders.
Coordinate with the fundraising team for all programs and associated communications.
Manage Member Program information internally (e.g., invitations, RSVP’s, event scenarios, briefings).
Ensure Program inclusion in Institutional Calendars, Museum Website, emails, and other promotional materials.
Interface with donors and members to build program attendance and engagement.
